document_data.mainbody:
rnest Cymrych was High King of the Moonshae Isles at the turn of the 8 century DR.
He was a member of the Cymrych Dynasty and the first son of his predecessor, High King Tobert. His successor was his own first son, Carthus Cymrych. His second son, Alec II, then ruled as High King after Carthus abdicated.
Ernest assumed the throne of the High King in the , following the death of his father.
He ruled for fifty-two years before being dying of natural causes in the .
